*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/07/05/wi-fi-certified-ac-wave-2-products-support-mu-mimo-160-mhz-channels-and-more/ ''Wi-Fi Certified AC Wave2 Products'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ==See also== *Broadcom BCM94709R4366AC - ''802.11ac 4x4 Wireless Adapter'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-PCIE0U00 MSQ-PCIE0U00] (2015-11-23) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 *[[Broadcom BCM94366MC]] (H5) - ''802.11a/n/ac 4x4 Radio Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1092 QDS-BRCM1092] (2017-04-18) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E *[[Broadcom BCM94709R-H]] - ''802.11a/n/ac High-Power 5GHz AP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1092 QDS-BRCM1092] (2017-04-18) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E *[[Broadcom BCM94366EMC]] (H5) - ''802.11a/n/ac 4x4 Radio Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1091 QDS-BRCM1091] (2017-04-14) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E *[[Broadcom BCM94709R-M]] - ''802.11a/n/ac Mid-Power 5GHz AP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1091 QDS-BRCM1091] (2017-04-14) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4366E [[Category:English Documentation]]
